application.title: Health Authority
application.organization.name: Federal Office of Information Technology, Systems and Telecommunication FOITT
code.title: Please send this authorisation code to the patient
code.sent: I have sent the code to the patient
help.title: Help
help.text1: The "Contagion date" is the date when the patient becomes contagious. The contagion window will then be automatically computed.
help.text2: Based on the contagion date, a single use authentication code will be generated, please communicate it to your patient, without the whitespaces, so that he can enter it in the tracking app.
help.text3: Authentication codes are not locally saved, meaning a new one have to be generated, should the patient require it anew.
i18n.validation.matDatepickerMax: Date cannot be in the future
